attributes.action: Pay student teachers for their placement and provide them a bursary
attributes.additional_details: Student teachers work full time as a teacher on placement and receive no funding. We take work home and work hours as a qualified teacher and teach up to 100 percent of the time table and it is hard to continue with life when we are working full time and unable to earn money to afford a living
attributes.background: Pay student teachers for their placement and provide them a bursary

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620461
